stories.title: Things you didn't know about Kube APIs and CRDs

stories.text:
Hey HN,

I'm wondering: what are expected to be the best places to live in 2050, considering climate change and the potential for impending societal collapse? What are the characteristics of such places? What should we keep in mind?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Place to Live in 2050?

stories.text:
In lieu of the condo collapse in Miami and floods Germany I wonder how to protect oneself from being killed while sleeping.

Is it feasible to have some kind of metal cage around the bed? The idea is that the cage would leave you with a pocket of air and also shield you from parts of ceiling crushing you.

What other ideas do you have and what were your findings when doing further research?
stories.title: Cage around bed to survive building collapse?
